Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Slashing plus 10 Poison

Other Actions.Action 1: Teleport, The Arcanaloth can magically teleport to an unoccupied space it can see

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Arcanaloth can cast a few spells innately
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Arcanaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Weapons, The Arcanaloth's weapon attacks are magical
Abilities.Ability 4: Spellcasting, In addition to its Innate Spellcasting, the Arcanaloth is a 16th level spellcaster with a large number of Wizard spells prepared

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
